sentences.sentence: Our main products include toilet, washbasin, bidet, cabinet, urinal, faucet, bathtub and other bathroom accessories.
sentences.translation: 我们的主要产品包括卫生间，洗脸盆， 浴盆， 柜， 小便器， 水龙头， 浴缸和其他浴室配件。

sentences.sentence: Though I keep telling older people that the bidet helps with constipation.
sentences.translation: 即使我不断的告诉老人们这个做浴盆对便秘有好处。
